PHRASE.LANG: There's enough punch in those gloves to wipe the smirk off any foe you might encounter. [#Legal]
Votre punch fera passer l'envie de rire à vos adversaires. [#Legal]
Diese Handschuhe besitzen genug Schlagkraft, um jedem Feind das Grinsen aus dem Gesicht zu prügeln. [#Legal]
Perché i pugni da soli non bastano a togliere il sorriso ai nemici sulla tua strada. [#Legal]
Estos guanteletes tienen empaque suficiente para borrarle la sonrisa de la cara a cualquier rival. [#Legal]
적의 얼굴에서 미소를 사라지게 만드는 강력한 펀치를 날려 주십시오. [#Legal]
There's enough punch in those gloves to wipe the smirk off any foe you might encounter. [#Legal]
這對護手足以抹走敵人臉上的笑容。 [#Legal]
這對護手足以抹走敵人臉上的笑容。 [#Legal]
There's enough punch in those gloves to wipe the smirk off any foe you might encounter. [#Legal]
